page.title: 05Being at School in Fakenham
page.content: When we first started school it was good fun and we painted pictures and didn't do much work because we were only 4yrs. old. When we went into Miss Webb's class there were still lots of toys but we had to do more work. Now we are in Class 1 and we do a lot of work, but we still have time to paint and have fun. We are doing a lot of work for the Domesday Project, but that is fun. In September we will be going to the Junior School where there are lots of bigger children, but lots of us have brothers and sisters there so we won't be scared. Our new teacher will be Mrs. Brown. When we are a lot older we will go to the High School. That school is very big with lots of teachers and we don't know any of them. Some of us know older children who go to that school they say they have to work very hard.
